t: Hitachi Koki USA (Hitachi Power Tools) | LinkedIn
s: The world is changing, and so is our company. Metabo HPT is the new brand name for Koki Holdings America Ltd., formerly part of the Hitachi group. Over the last 70 years, we have become a trusted partner for our customers who rely on our tools every day for their toughest jobs.

t: Our History: Koki Holdings Co.,Ltd.
s: Our company name changed in June 2018 from Hitachi Koki Co. Ltd. to Koki Holdings Co. Ltd. Our primary power tool brand HITACHI was also renamed HiKOKI in October that same year. We own multiple global brands including HiKOKI, Metabo, MetaboHPT, CARAT, and Sankyo Diamond.
